meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the fissionables materials in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The reactor used fissionables to generate energy.
meanings.sent3: The fissionables elements were so excited to split!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like fissionables, splitting ideas rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The glowing fissionables were a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: Materials that can undergo nuclear fission.
meanings.sent1: The storage facility held a large supply of fissionables.
meanings.sent2: Countries must handle fissionables with extreme care.
meanings.sent3: The fissionables seemed to have a party inside the container.
meanings.sent4: The potential of fissionables is as powerful as a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of new fissionables changed the course of history.
